name: DeathRun Portable
description: DeathRun Portable - addictive game in which you will choose the role of the victim or the killer. In this game, players have two options: killers and the runners, they have different targets runners need to run to the end of the map alive, and the killer is necessary in that it is not, do not let them do it, placing their traps everywhere.Run through the beautiful worlds, jump on platforms and bypass or set traps, which should fall your victim. Use your opportunity and do not let the enemy catch you either run away from persecution based role you choose.
